overview:
Co-Founder & VP Marketing & Sales at Infima Technologies.

Avi is resposible for all of its strategic relationship with enterprises and for OEM sells, responsible directly for all the company’s markom and its website. moreover he’s responsible for presenting the company and its technology for potencial customers and collegues including in seminar and conventions such as “Jetro Bizmatch” in Japan.

Infima Technologies is a promising dynamic start-up company which developed the NCM, a world leading compression technology with significant advantage over existing technologies. Since its inception, the company has already gained recognition as a technology leader and initiated deals with world leaders as Yahoo, EMCÂ², Kodak, NEC, NDS, PTC, Toshiba Medical and moreâ€¦
